metadata.name: define_function2_swf_7
metadata.description: Tests DEFINE_FUNCTION2 opcode (0x8E) - enhanced function definition with register support

notes: Function definition works but function body parsing is not yet complete
Function calling (CALL_FUNCTION) is not yet implemented
Test validates that functions can be defined without errors
Future enhancements needed: function body parsing, calling, preloading, arguments object
